DOC.brief_title: Handling Comparison Between Two Contact Lens Types
DOC.criteria: 1 . The subject must read , understand sign Statement Informed Consent receive fully execute copy form . 2 . The subject must appear able willing adhere instruction set forth clinical protocol . 3 . The subject must 40 70 year age . 4 . The subject 's vertex correct spherical equivalent distance refraction must range +0.25 +4.00 plano 6.00 eye . 5 . The subject 's refractive cylinder must less equal 0.75 D eye . 6 . The subject 's ADD power must range +0.75 D +2.50 D eye . 7 . The subject best correct visual acuity 20/20 3 good eye . 8 . Subject must wearable pair spectacle . 9 . The subject must adaptable soft contact lens wearer eye ( i.e . worn lens minimum 2 day per week least 8 hour per day , 1 month duration ) 10 . The subject must already wear presbyopic contact lens correction ( e.g . read spectacle contact lens , multifocal monovision contact lenses , etc . ) respond positively least one symptom `` Presbyopic Symptoms Questionnaire '' . 1 . Currently pregnant lactating ( subject become pregnant study discontinue ) . 2 . Any ocular systemic allergy disease may interfere contact lens wear . 3 . Any systemic disease , autoimmune disease , use medication , may interfere contact lens wear . 4 . Any ocular abnormality may interfere contact lens wear . 5 . Use ocular medication , exception rewetting drop . 6 . Any previous intraocular surgery ( e.g . radial keratotomy , photorefractive keratectomy ( PRK ) , laserassisted situ keratomileusis ( LASIK ) , etc . ) 7 . Any grade 3 great slit lamp finding ( e.g . edema , corneal neovascularization , corneal staining , tarsal abnormality , conjunctival injection ) may contraindicate contact lens wear . 8 . Any ocular infection inflammation . 9 . History herpetic keratitis . 10 . Any corneal distortion irregular cornea . 11 . History binocular vision abnormality strabismus . 12 . Any infectious disease ( e.g . hepatitis , tuberculosis ) contagious immunosuppressive disease ( e.g . HIV ) . 13 . Current history diabetes . 14 . Participation contact lens lens care product clinical trial within 30 day prior study enrollment .
